version_description:
- fixed hardware reporting for iPhone 5
- fixed memory-related issues on iPad 3 and iPhone 5
- support for the new iPhone 5 wide screen
- added SSID, BSSID and network submask
- many under-the-hood user interface performance improvements
- several graphical user interface improvements
- many minor changes and enhancements
- added link to the new Network Analyzer app to the About page

- fix device information for iPod Touch 5, iPad 4, and iPad Mini
- fix microphone presence information on iPad 1
- correct "label" to "External IP" on iPhone
- make System Log clearing persistent
- refresh SSID and BSSID when connected to different network
- several crash fixes and other minor improvements

MAJOR NEW FEATURES
- added resource graphs for CPU, memory & network activity (see the graph button in the toolbar on the Overview and Memory pages)
- it is possible to record up to 10 minutes of background activity
- pause the graphs and pinch to zoom & pan to see the past results

IMPORTANT: REMOVED FULL CHARGE ALERT
On Apple request the 'music' background service had to be removed from the app which was necessary for the full charge sound notification. For this reason the full charge sound alert is not available any more. There are still some older apps on the App Store offering this feature so you may find a suitable (free) substitute. Sorry for the inconvenience.

OTHER CHANGES
- remember the last visited page when relaunching the app (replaces the manual settings which most people did not discover)
- added data sent/received since the last boot
- added IP of DNS server
- fixed iPad 4 graphics card reporting
- minor fixes and improvements
- many stability improvements

• add units on y-axes in graphs
• add the possibility to clear cell/wi-fi usage graphs
• remember the last used graph page
• remove UDID as it is not allowed to be accessed by apps any more
• add VPN connection information when using VPN - add icons for individual battery work time scenarios - improve iOS 7 compatibility
• many stability, performance and usability improvements

---

Thanks for everyone's feedback and suggestions!

• iOS 7 compatibility improvements (new user interface to come in a future release)
• iOS 7 style icon
• minor fixes and improvements

- added file statistics info
- added more charge alert frequency settings
- added copy/paste possibility for most values
- added export of device info by email
- show MNC/MCC codes on iPhone
- improved reliability of external IP detection
- fixed wrong plotting of active/inactive memory
- improved scrolling performance of the process list
- improved application start time
- other minor bugfixes and improvements

- add active connection list
- add routing table display
- add system log display
- add full charge alarm trigger when charge reaches 100%
- add some useful links to the about page
- app icon updates
- don't ask for rating after a new release if previously rated/declined to rate (sorry for the annoyance)
- many minor tweaks and improvements

• more changes to match the iOS 7 style
• iOS 7.1 compatibility fixes
• more export possibilities (AirPrint, AirDrop, etc.)
• plot export option
• stability improvements
• various user interface and performance improvements

- improved iOS 5 support
- iPhone 4S support
- display does not have to be on during charging when full charge notification sound is enabled
- pull-to-refresh for lists
- display mounted file systems in disk usage details
- fixed rare bug when a blank page was displayed after resuming the app
- customizable start page via preferences
- help viewer within the app so external window does not have to be opened to view the documentation
- fixed ipv6 addresses overflow
- used interface displayed in the Connections page
- system log export via email
- system log message clipboard copy copies all message info
- help and support improvements
- many minor fixes and improvements

-----

Thanks for everyone's support and ideas for further improvement! Your feedback is highly appreciated.

• add cell network type to the Overview page
• stability fixes and minor improvements
• fix minor stability problems
• fix minor stability problems

- fix incorrect hardware info for iPad 3
- add high-resolution graphics for iPad 3
- display domain name in connection list
- email export for routing table and connection list
- support pre-4.2.1 iOS 4 versions
- stability fixes and other minor improvements

- fixed rare Connections hang
- stability improvements
- email export of process list
- URL scheme support so System Status can be launched from other apps
- other minor improvements

• iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 Plus optimized user interface (the app requires iOS 8 and later now)
• report kilo/mega bit/byte in multiples of 1000 instead of 1024 for disk capacity and data usage to avoid confusion
• don't show file statistics for iCloud files in disk details
• new hardware feature reporting (motion coprocessor, NFC, fingerprint sensor, barometer)
• workaround the white button problem with "button shapes" accessibility option
• various stability fixes and minor improvements

• Revert the disk usage calculation change so the 1024 multiplier is used again (which is used by iTunes too)
• Fix file statistics
• Show both local and iCloud file counts in file statistics
• Add video count to file statistics

• because iOS 9 does not allow apps to access the process info, hide the Processes page on iOS 9 (the process info is still available on iOS 8 devices)
• various bug fixes

• because iOS 9 does not allow apps to access the process info, hide the Processes page on iOS 9 (the process info is still available on iOS 8 devices)
• various bug fixes

• because iOS 9 does not allow apps to access the process info, hide the Processes page on iOS 9 (the process info is still available on iOS 8 devices)
• various bug fixes

• because iOS 9 does not allow apps to access the process info, hide the Processes page on iOS 9 (the process info is still available on iOS 8 devices)
• various bug fixes

• fix memory accounting on devices with 2GB of memory
• add iOS 9 iPad multitasking support
• update for new iOS devices
• various minor fixes

• fix memory accounting on devices with 2GB of memory
• add iOS 9 iPad multitasking support
• update for new iOS devices
• various minor fixes

• fix memory accounting on devices with 2GB of memory
• add iOS 9 iPad multitasking support
• update for new iOS devices
• various minor fixes

• iPad Pro support
• various bug fixes

• iPad Pro support
• various bug fixes

• iPad Pro support
• various bug fixes

• iOS 10 compatibility fixes
• removed Connections page on iOS 10 where the connection info isn't accessible any more (it is still available on iOS 9)
• full IPv6 support and addition of IPv6-related information
• moved graphs from the Overview page to a separate page
• added export for all the information from the Overview page
• various minor fixes and improvements

• stability fixes and minor improvements

*** If you like the app, please consider rating it on the App Store. It really helps. Thanks!

• show CPU architecture (32-bit, 64-bit) on Details page
• show all DNS servers on the Overview page
• fix huge y-axis scale bug for wifi/cell plots (you need to clear the plot with the garbage bin icon at the bottom of the graph first)
• improved iOS 11 support
• improved support of iPad Pro 10.5 and split screen mode
• lots of minor fixes, performance and stability improvements

5.6.1
• fix a problem when values don't get updated when switching between Overview and Memory page
• fix crash when saving plots to the photos library

5.6
• show CPU architecture (32-bit, 64-bit) on Details page
• show all DNS servers on the Overview page
• fix huge y-axis scale bug for wifi/cell plots (you need to clear the plot with the garbage bin icon at the bottom of the graph first)
• improved iOS 11 support
• improved support of iPad Pro 10.5 and split screen mode
• lots of minor fixes, performance and stability improvements

• improved iPhone X support
• minor stability fixes and improvements

• Fix free storage reporting on iOS 11. For free space calculation use the sum of free storage and the storage used by iOS for temporary files which is automatically freed when storage space is low. This way the app shows the same amount of free storage as the Settings app.
• Fix crash when exporting plots
• Various minor fixes and improvements

• Allow showing additional details related to external IP (location, AS number, hostname, etc.)
• Show information about all available network interfaces on the Information page
• Show IPv6 prefix lengths on the Information page
• iOS 12 compatibility improvements
• Lots of internal changes and cleanups
• Various UI updates, minor improvements and fixes

5.7.1
• Stability fixes and minor improvements

5.7
• Allow showing additional details related to external IP (location, AS number, hostname, etc.)
• Show information about all available network interfaces on the Information page
• Show IPv6 prefix lengths on the Information page
• iOS 12 compatibility improvements
• Lots of internal changes and cleanups
• Various UI updates, minor improvements and fixes

5.7.2
• Stability improvements

5.7
• Allow showing additional details related to external IP (location, AS number, hostname, etc.)
• Show information about all available network interfaces on the Information page
• Show IPv6 prefix lengths on the Information page
• iOS 12 compatibility improvements
• Lots of internal changes and cleanups
• Various UI updates, minor improvements and fixes

• Added the possibility to enable the location permission which is required to access SSID/BSSID since iOS 13
• Added support for latest devices
• Plots are drawn using a different plotting library as the previouls library stopped getting supported (there are minor differences in behavior in certain cases)
• Entering background/foreground is now shown in the plot using brown vertical lines with bg/fg labels
• Various fixes and improvements
• TODO: dark mode will be supported in the upcoming release

• iOS 7 style user interface
• removed the system log page as the system log isn't accessible under iOS 7 any more
• improved compatibility with iPhone 5S
• many minor fixes and improvements
